scripts.presass: for d in $npm_package_folders; do rm -rf "${d}/${npm_package_assets_css_out}"; done;
scripts.sass: for d in $npm_package_folders; do export local_dir; local_dir="${d}/${npm_package_assets_css_src}"; export local_out; local_out="${d}/${npm_package_assets_css_out}"; npm run sass:unminified; npm run sass:minified ; done;
scripts.prejs: for d in $npm_package_folders; do rm -rf "${d}/${npm_package_assets_js_out}"; done;
scripts.js: for d in $npm_package_folders; do export local_files; local_files="${d}/${npm_package_assets_js_src}"; export local_out; local_out="${d}/${npm_package_assets_js_out}"; npm run js:unminified; npm run js:minified; done;
scripts.js:unminified: for f in $local_files**/*.js; do relative=$(realpath --relative-to="$local_files" "$f"); file=${f%.js}; mkdir -p "${local_out}$(dirname $relative)"; cp -f "$f" "${local_out}${relative}"; done
scripts.js:minified: for f in $local_out**/*.js; do relative=$(realpath --relative-to="$local_out" "$f"); file="${local_out}${relative}"; file="${file%.js}"; uglifyjs $f -c -m --output $file.min.js; done
scripts.watch:css: files="";for d in $npm_package_folders; do files="${files} ${d}/${npm_package_assets_css_src}**/*.scss"; done; onchange -k -i $files -- npm run sass
scripts.watch:js: files="";for d in $npm_package_folders; do files="${files} ${d}/${npm_package_assets_js_src}**/*.js"; done; onchange -k -i $files -- npm run js
